Name: Correct drawings used & issued for construction
Tag 1: The correct drawings have been used and issued for construction

Name: All workers inducted & read appropriate SWMS for tasks
Tag 1: All workers been inducted and read appropriate SWMS for tasks and prestart signed

Name: Appropriate materials used for application & sizing as per drawings
Tag 1: Appropriate materials have been used for application and sizing is as per drawings

Name: Meter marks issued by RCC & works completed off them
Tag 1: Meter marks have been issued by RCC and works have been completed off them

Name: Q/A done to ensure all pipework/fittings in place & in position
Tag 1: Q/A been done to ensure all pipework/fittings is in place and in correct position

Name: All pipework installed & secured as per AS/NZS 3500
Tag 1: All pipework is installed and secured as per AS/NZS 3500

Name: Pipework pressure tested for 24 hours
Tag 1: Pipework has been pressure tested for 24 hours - attach photo of pressure gauge

Name: Stud grommets installed & pipes through studs siliconed
Tag 1: Stud grommets are installed and pipes through studs are siliconed
